晴後曇: (はれのちくもり) - cloudy after fine; sunny then cloudy; clear then cloudy
晴後雨: (はれのちあめ) - clear then rain (e.g. weather forecast)
晴晴: (せいせい) - feeling refreshed; feeling relieved
晴曇: (せいどん) - fine weather and cloudy
晴朗: (せいろう) - clear; fair; fine; serene
晴渡る: (はれわたる) - to clear up; to become cloudless; to be refreshed
晴男: (はれおとこ) - man who causes the weather to become sunny when he gets out
晴耕雨読: (せいこううどく) - (yoji) working in the field in fine weather and reading at home in rainy weather; living in quiet retirement dividing time between work and intellectual pursuits
晴舞台: (はれぶたい) - big moment (e.g. performance, in the spotlight); gala occasion; (on the) world stage
晴間: (はれま) - break (in the weather, esp. rain or snow)/interval of clear weather; lightheartedness
晶洞: (しょうどう) - {geol} druse; globular calcium oxalate crystals, often lining a rock cavity
智力: (ちりょく) - wisdom; intellectual power; intelligence; mental capacity; brains
智勇兼備: (ちゆうけんび) - (yoji) having both wisdom and courage
智将: (ちしょう) - skilled manager; resourceful general
智山派: (ちざんは) - Chisan sect (of Shingi Shingon Buddhism); Chizan sect
智恵: (ちえ) - wisdom/wit/sagacity/sense/intelligence; (usu. 智慧) prajna (insight leading to enlightenment)
智恵分別: (ちえふんべつ) - (yoji) wisdom and good (common sense) judgment
智恵才覚: (ちえさいかく) - (yoji) having wisdom and resources; being clever and talented
智慧: (ちえ) - wisdom/wit/sagacity/sense/intelligence; (usu. 智慧) prajna (insight leading to enlightenment)
智水: (ちすい) - purifying wisdom of a buddha; purifying water of wisdom used in a Buddhist baptism
智者: (ちさ) - sage/wise man/wise person/man of wisdom; (esp. 智者) buddha/bodhisattva/enlightened priest
智者不惑: (ちしゃふわく) - (yoji) a wise person always follows the right course; a wise man never wavers
智解: (ちかい) - being enlightened by virtue of knowledge
暁光: (ぎょうこう) - the light of dawn
暁角: (ぎょうかく) - sound of a horn announcing daybreak
暁起き: (あかつきおき) - waking up just before daybreak
暁鴉: (ぎょうあ) - crow cawing in the morning; crows crying in the morning
暇: (hima) - () - spare time , spare time, free time, leisure; time (ex. tempo que leva para fazer algo); time off, day off, vacation, holiday, leave; quitting (one's job), firing someone, divorcing (one's spouse)
暇がない: (ひまがない) - busy; having no (free) time
暇が無い: (ひまがない) - busy; having no (free) time
暇つぶし: (himatsubushi) - perda de tempo, passando o tempo
暇な商売: (ひまなしょうばい) - dull business
暇にあかす: (ひまにあかす) - to spend all of one's free time; to spend one's time without constraint
暇に飽かす: (ひまにあかす) - to spend all of one's free time; to spend one's time without constraint
暇ねた: (ヒマネタ) - unimportant piece of news; news unrelated to major events or pressing social conditions
暇もなく: (いとまもなく) - without losing time (e.g. to do); without even time for (doing something)
暇も無く: (いとまもなく) - without losing time (e.g. to do); without even time for (doing something)
暇をつぶす: (ひまをつぶす) - to waste time; to kill time
暇を出す: (ひまをだす) - to fire someone/to discharge someone; to divorce one's wife
暇を潰す: (ひまをつぶす) - to waste time; to kill time
暇ネタ: (ヒマネタ) - unimportant piece of news; news unrelated to major events or pressing social conditions
暇乞: (いとまごい) - leave-taking; offering one's resignation; farewell visit
暇乞い: (いとまごい) - leave-taking; offering one's resignation; farewell visit
暇人: (ひまじん) - person with a lot of free time on their hands; person of leisure; idler
暇潰し: (ひまつぶし) - waste of time; killing time
暈かす: (ぼかす) - to shade off; to obscure
暈け: (ボケ) - bokeh; blur; lack of focus; unsharpness
暈ける: (ぼける) - to be faded; to be hazy; to be blurred; to be out of focus
暈す: (ぼかす) - to shade off; to obscure
暈繝: (うげん) - method of dying in which a color repeatedly goes from dense to diffuse, diffuse to dense - imported from western China and used in Buddhist pictures, temple ornaments, etc., during the Nara and Heian periods
暑い: (atsui) - hot, warm, sultry, heated; passionate, impassioned, burning (desejo, etc.) , hot, warm, sultry, heated; passionate, impassioned, burning (desire, etc.); on everybody's mind, on the radar, du jour, interested (gaze, etc.)
暑い盛り: (あついさかり) - heat of the day; hottest part of the day
暑がる: (あつがる) - to complain of the heat; to feel the heat
暑さ中り: (あつさあたり) - suffering from the heat; heatstroke; heat prostration
暑さ凌ぎ: (あつさしのぎ) - relief from the heat
暑さ寒さも彼岸まで: (あつささむさもひがんまで) - No heat or cold lasts over the equinox
暑さ寒さも彼岸迄: (あつささむさもひがんまで) - No heat or cold lasts over the equinox
暑を避ける: (しょをさける) - to summer; to go away for the summer
暑中お見舞: (しょちゅうおみまい) - summer greeting card; inquiry after someone's health in the hot season
暑中お見舞い: (しょちゅうおみまい) - summer greeting card; inquiry after someone's health in the hot season
暑中お見舞い申し上げます: (しょちゅうおみまいもうしあげます) - midsummer greetings; to inquiry after someone's health in the hot season
